scripts.docker:up: npm run generate:mongo:init && docker-compose --env-file ./.env -f docker/docker-compose.yml up -d
scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn build:client && yarn build:api
scripts.start: yarn clean && yarn docker:up && yarn build && concurrently "yarn start:client" "yarn start:api"
scripts.dev: yarn clean && concurrently "yarn docker:up" "yarn dev:client &" "yarn dev:api & "
